name: Austin App House (SnakeHead Software)
description:
Our Apps Be prepared to experience apps unlike anything you’ve ever seen. It takes a talented team to create visually stunning, audibly fantastic, and easy to use applications. Our mission is to create fun, exciting, and unique games for the iPhone platform leveraging our collective experience in gaming, software development and business strategy as well as sound and graphic design to create appealing, high-end apps for our users and our clients.
Custom Development We bring your vision to reality. Whether you’re looking to port an existing application, or create an exciting new game, SnakeHead Software can deliver. Our development team has over 20 years experience in the game industry and was one of the early developers on the iPhone platform. We would love to discuss your next great project with you. * Applications for iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad and Android * Advertising mechanisms to increase visibility and revenue * Graphics Design * Localization of Applications for world-wide sales*
